name: Game Boo Pocket Pinball
description:
Z and Right Shift (L and R on controller) to flip

Enter or Space Bar (Lower face button on controller) to accept and to pull plunger

Arrow keys or (D-pad on controller) to nudge

Esc to pause

I would have loved to use left and right shift for the flippers but unfortunately Godot does not differentiate between the shift keys.
